name: Heritage
overview: You are a space pilot sent on a dangerous mission. You must visit a mysterious asteroid that was once a shelter for a group of brilliant but mad scientists. It is believed that they made discoveries that would rise human science to a new level. Your mission is to recover their lost knowledge - recover their heritage. That won't be easy. With your spacecraft destroyed, you must first find a way of leaving the asteroid. You will need both quick reflexes and logical thinking to overcome the obstacles and eventually accomplish your mission.
